name: Horror Hunt
description: Inspired by the classic "Prop Hunt", Horror Hunt combines the elements of "hide and seek" and a horror atmosphere. Players are separated into two teams -The Hunted, and Props. As a prop your job is to prevent the "Hunted" from finding the 4 codes to unlock the door and escape. Props may turn into almost anything from the environment, stealth, melee attack, throwing dagger, as well as night-vision. As the Hunted your job is to collect the 4 codes to unlock the one key-padded door to escape and win the round. Equipped with an assault rifle with unlimited ammo, unlimited sprint, glow-sticks, and a flashlight. After the round is over the teams swap roles.
